description
======================
Mutant nanobots threaten humanity! Assume the role of a combat robot with a large plasma blade and save the world from destruction . Time is becoming less ...

Distant future does not look rosy . It has long been announced Armageddon just become the daily bread of human time coming . Mutated machine peak nanotechnology , people just declared war. So far, obedient , got out of the guardianship of biological beings and yearned to take over the world . From that moment people are excellent material for them to create cyborgs them only subordinate . Chaos is spreading ...

In " Nanobreaker " the player takes the role of a warrior for a better tomorrow , or in a military killing machine . Its main armament is a plasma blade , and a few other no less effective weapons . This solution is also the final achievement of cyber engineers , and therefore has some amazing capabilities . It can , for example, to change the shape and adapt - like a chameleon - the conditions outside. And there blood, conflagration and a constant battle - can survive only the strongest ( and best- armed ) . Next pukawek cyborg that can also fight according to the old-fashioned rules , that is, using the range of their limbs. His task boils down to one common denominator : to save the planet and the human race against the rebel machines.

Graphically " Nanobreaker " looks impressive. There is no shortage here of a large number of various special effects and dark play of light . Also mounted audio is not lagging behind . The game does not have multiplayer .
